title: mEvi vandEn
sahitya:
mEvi vandEn shrI rAmA rAmA manam kanindu enakkirangi tanadAkkum dinam nADi


anupallavi

  kUvi azhaikkum en nAvinikkak-kazhal sEvikkum aDimai mei shilirkka unai


caraNam    kazhal kaNDEn angen gati koNDEn abhaya karam kaNDEn enran kali tIrndEn
 kamala malarAL urai maRbu kaNDEn angE kaustubhattil kOTi jIvan kaNDEn
 parinda bhayam tarum idazh kaNDEn bhava bhayam parandiDak-kaNDEn
 aruL shurakkum iru vizhi kaNDEn pErAnanda vAriyil tiLait-tezhundEn
